title: Sleep consistency lowers metabolic stress
impact: Regular sleep timing reduced insulin variance by 18%.

title: Urban air pollution linked to cardiovascular strain
impact: Higher PM2.5 exposure correlated with suppressed HRV trends.

title: Sedentary blocks above 90 minutes destabilize glucose
impact: Movement breaks reduced post-meal glycemic excursions.

title: Post-meal 10 minute walks improve glycemic control
impact: Consistent short walks reduced two-hour glucose spikes.

title: Hydration status influences perceived stress load
impact: Mild dehydration aligned with higher fatigue and irritability.
